feature.door.name: door
feature.door.description: Doors can be opened and closed with 'o'. They won't stop intelligent creatures.

feature.moss.name: patch of moss
feature.moss.description: Moss provides a small amount of naturae charges, before needing to regrow.

feature.pool.name: reflecting pool
feature.pool.description: This pool provides an unlimited supply of water charges.

feature.forge.name: forge
feature.forge.description: The only thing you can use this forge for is as a supply of fire charges.

feature.campfire.name: campfire
feature.campfire.description: For others, this is a cooking fire. For you, this is a source of fire charges.

feature.tree.name: tree
feature.tree.description: You can draw naturae charges from this tree.

feature.altar.name: altar
feature.altar.description: This altar is sacred to many gods. Use 'p' to pray at it.

feature.worldportal.name: world portal
feature.worldportal.description: Through here, you can enter the narrative of a mortal realm somewhere in the multiverse.
